x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/create/shipment"

payload = json.dumps({
  "shipmentCreateRequest": {
    "serviceLevel": "EC",
    "readyTime": "2023-01-31T09:00:00-05:00",
    "closeTime": "2023-01-31T17:00:00-05:00",
    "deliveryWindowFrom": "2023-02-02T14:00:00-04:00",
    "deliveryWindowTo": "2022-02-02T16:00:00-04:00",
    "delBy": "Between",
    "UserID": "WebtrakUserID",
    "insuredValue": 1234.56,
    "mode": "DOM",
    "incoterm": "EXW",
    "customerNumber": "9468",
    "projectCode": "ZZZ999",
    "billTo": "3",
    "specialInstructions": "DRIVER WILL NEED PALLET WRAP",
    "controllingStation": "DFW",
    "shipper": {
      "name": "Test Shipper Inc.",
      "address": "2423 PLEASANT RD",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "Someplace",
      "state": "GA",
      "zip": "31234",
      "country": "US",
      "showName": "",
      "venueName": "",
      "booth": "",
      "decorator": "",
      "contact": "Test Person",
      "phone": "8135551514",
      "email": "test@gmail.com"
    },
    "consignee": {
      "name": "Anonyco",
      "address": "651W57thSt",
      "address2": "",
      "city": "NewNewYork",
      "zip": "10019",
      "country": "US",
      "showName": "Widgits 2023",
      "venueName": "Javits Convention Center",
      "booth": "999a",
      "decorator": "Decorations Inc",
      "contact": "B.Rodriquez",
      "phone": "2125552254",
      "email": "matt@planetexpress.us"
    },
    "shipmentLines": [
      {
        "description": "EQUIPMENT",
        "pieces": 4,
        "pieceType": "PCE",
        "weight": 15,
        "weightUOM": "LB",
        "length": 12,
        "width": 15,
        "height": 10,
        "dimUOM": "IN",
        "hazmat": False
      }
    ],
    "customerReference": [
      {
        "refParty": "Shipper",
        "refType": "PO",
        "refNumber": "ABC123"
      },
      {
        "refParty": "BillTo",
        "refType": "REF",
        "refNumber": "DEF456"
      }
    ],
    "accessorialList": [
      "PALL",
      "SHRNK"
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/create/shipment' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data-raw '{
    "shipmentCreateRequest": {
        "serviceLevel": "EC",
        "readyTime": "2023-01-31T09:00:00-05:00",
        "closeTime": "2023-01-31T17:00:00-05:00",
        "deliveryWindowFrom": "2023-02-02T14:00:00-04:00",
        "deliveryWindowTo": "2022-02-02T16:00:00-04:00",
        "delBy": "Between",
        "UserID": "WebtrakUserID",
        "insuredValue": 1234.56,
        "mode": "DOM",
        "incoterm": "EXW",
        "customerNumber": "9468",
        "projectCode": "ZZZ999",
        "billTo": "3",
        "specialInstructions": "DRIVER WILL NEED PALLET WRAP",
        "controllingStation": "DFW",
        "shipper": {
            "name": "Test Shipper Inc.",
            "address": "2423 PLEASANT RD",
            "address2": "",
            "city": "Someplace",
            "state": "GA",
            "zip": "31234",

            "showName": "",
            "venueName": "",
            "booth": "",
            "decorator": "",
            "contact": "Test Person",
            "phone": "8135551514",
            "email": "test@gmail.com"
        },
        "consignee": {
            "name": "Anonyco",
            "address": "651W57thSt",
            "address2": "",
            "city": "NewNewYork",
            "state": "NY",
            "zip": "10019",
            "country": "US",
            "showName": "Widgits 2023",
            "venueName": "Javits Convention Center",
            "booth": "999a",
            "decorator": "Decorations Inc",
            "contact": "B.Rodriquez",
            "phone": "2125552254",
            "email": "matt@planetexpress.us"
        },
        "shipmentLines": [
            {
                "description": "EQUIPMENT",
                "pieces": 4,
                "pieceType": "PCE",
                "weight": 15,
                "weightUOM": "LB",
                "length": 12,
                "width": 15,
                "height": 10,
                "dimUOM": "IN",
                "hazmat": false
            }
        ],
        "customerReference": [
            {
                "refParty": "Shipper",
                "refType": "PO",
                "refNumber": "ABC123"
            },
            {
                "refParty": "BillTo",
                "refType": "REF",
                "refNumber": "DEF456"
            }
        ],
        "accessorialList": [
            "PALL",
            "SHRNK"
        ]
    }
}'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/shipment/info?house_bill_nbr=7010249' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/invoice/detail?house_bill_nbr=5865228' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232"

payload="<file contents here>"
headers = {
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>',
  'Content-Type': 'text/plain'
}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--header 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
--data-binary '@'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/proofofdelivery?house_bill_nbr=5869785' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/shipment/getdocument?housebill=SAT5810973-00&docType=BI' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/shipment/rate' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--data '{
        "shipmentRateRequest": {
            "pickupTime": "2023-11-11T17:00:00",
            "shipperZip": "40118",
            "consigneeZip": "60502",
            "shipmentLines": [
                {
                    "pieces": 3,
                    "pieceType": "PCE",
                    "weight": 225,
                    "weightUOM": "lb",
                    "length": 20,
                    "width": 20,
                    "height": 30,
                    "dimUOM": "in",
                    "hazmat": false
                }
            ],
            "accessorialList": []
        }
    }'

import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/shipment/create"

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v2.1/shipment/list/{customerID}' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

ApiKeyAuth.description: For this sample, you can use the api key `x-api-key` to test the authorization filters.
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
